## MomentDateApi class

Date api using MomentJS, used for obtaining DateApi wrapper object

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class MomentDateApi implements DateApi<moment.Moment> 
```
<b>Implements:</b> DateApi&lt;moment.Moment&gt;
